Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Description: Conical vase with a flat base. The interior is black while the exterior, coated with pale red-brown colour, bears a complex geometrical pattern. This decoration is composed of a number or horizontal bands coloured dark red, reminiscent of basket work. The whole object has been carefully polished.
